prodNameC: 常盈醛類脂醇檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc: Aldosterone Standard:One vial, labeled A, containing 0 pg/mL and six vials, labeled B-G, containing concentrations of approximately 25, 50, 100, 250, 800 and 1600 pg/mL (70-4448 pmol/L) of aldosterone in human serum with sodium azide as a preservative. *DSL-8600 (500 Tubes) contains three sets of Standards.Aldosterone [I-125] Reagent:One bottle, 55 mL, containing < 5 μCi (185 kBq) [I-125]-labeled aldosterone in a protein-based buffer (BSA) with sodium azide as a preservative.*DSL-8600 (500 Tubes) contains five bottles of Reagent.Aldosterone-Coated Tubes:One hundred (100) polystyrene tubes, with polyclonal rabbit anti-aldosterone immunoglobulin immobilized to the inside wall of each tube. *DSL-8600 (500 Tubes) contains five hundred (500) plastic tubes.Aldosterone Controls:Two vials, Levels I and II, containing low and high concentrations of aldosterone in human serum with sodium azide as a preservative. *DSL-8600 (500 Tubes) contains three sets of Controls.
applicantName: 常盈實業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市北投區永興路一段49號
efficacy: 利用放射性免疫定量方法檢測血清、血漿及尿液中的醛固酮。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
